text:
Can someone please do me a major favor...

Can someone send me a packaged file of their HubSpot practicum files they completed for the HubSpot CMS for Developers course.

I completed and passed mine in 2022 with the free sandbox they gave me but apparently that deactivated. I am trying to complete the HubSpot CMS for Developers II: Best Practices but it says I have to use the practicum I completed for HubSpot CMS for Developers as a starting point.

Well jokes on you if you don't do it within the 90 days. If you're inactive on the sandbox account for 90 days all of that gets deleted.. so I have nothing to start with. What a joke.

This is the reason why using a GitHub repo as a fallback is always a good choice :slightly_smiling_face:
You can start over, from scratch, I don't think it's a big deal :slightly_smiling_face:
or try to start from some boilerplate like
• <https://github.com/freshjuice-dev/freshjuice-HubSpot-theme>
• <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate>
